review_data.title: Great and not too expensive food, very friendly service!
review_data.content: We where 6 of us and had all different plates.The salads are good, I liked the Nuessli salad with egg. The chicken with a special pepper sauce was really good and also the spaghetti napoli! My daughter loved the Tom Kha Gai soup.

review_data.content: There are several reasons why the place it’s almost always full: great food, friendly service, family prices. The pasta menus are really good, and their drinks are well mixed. And give a go to the foosball or the pinball machine.
